Instance Property# lazy

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
var lazy: Self.Elements { get }
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `LazySequenceProtocol`.
